co2-calculation: cultivation + coconut desiccation + carton & secondary packaging. Estimate from graph: 0 + 0.04 + 0.39 = 0.43 kg CO2 / 0.5 kg = 0.86 kg CO2 / kg
references: Feraldi et al., 2012. Presentation of Franklin Associates. Life cycle assessment of coconut milk and two non-dairy milk beverage alternatives. Slide 12, tetra brik aseptic, estimations from graph
name: Kokos
comments: no official publication, packaging effect overestimated. Probably not carton, but plastic
